statements.__comment__: Drop legacy GCPProject->RESOURCE edges to pre-migration shared IpRange nodes.
statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)-[r:RESOURCE]->(n:IpRange) WHERE NOT n:GCPIpRange DELETE r

statements.__comment__: Drop legacy GCPProject->RESOURCE edges to pre-migration shared IpRule nodes.
statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)-[r:RESOURCE]->(n:IpRule) WHERE NOT n:GCPIpRule DELETE r

statements.__comment__: Drop legacy GCPProject->RESOURCE edges to pre-migration shared IpPermissionInbound nodes.
statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)-[r:RESOURCE]->(n:IpPermissionInbound) WHERE NOT n:GCPIpRule DELETE r

statements.__comment__: Delete legacy IpRange nodes that were never re-created with provider-scoped labels.
statements.query: MATCH (n:IpRange) WHERE NOT (n:AWSIpRange OR n:GCPIpRange) DETACH DELETE n

statements.__comment__: Delete legacy IpRule nodes that were never re-created with provider-scoped labels.
statements.query: MATCH (n:IpRule) WHERE NOT (n:AWSIpRule OR n:GCPIpRule) DETACH DELETE n

statements.__comment__: Delete legacy IpPermissionInbound nodes that were never re-created with provider-scoped labels.
statements.query: MATCH (n:IpPermissionInbound) WHERE NOT (n:AWSIpPermissionInbound OR n:GCPIpRule) DETACH DELETE n
